sentence.Network_en: Let me digress for a moment and explain what had happened previously.
sentence.Network_cn: 让我岔开一会儿,解释原先发生了什么.

sentence.Network_en: I digress. My tale does not primarily concern itself with the hen.
sentence.Network_cn: 我离题太远了,我所要讲的故事主要不是关于鸡.

sentence.Network_en: When writing about aerosol one is continually invited to digress.
sentence.Network_cn: 在描述气溶胶时人们经常离题.

Such digressions can lead us too far afield ., 这样的闲话会导致我们离题太远.
博硕英音英语语法：第四章：动词与动词词组 -... ... secede from a party（ 脱党）， digress from（ 离开主题）。 cease from（ 中止…

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin digress- 'stepped away', from the verb digredi, from di- 'aside' + gradi 'to walk'

entry.def: If you digress, you move away from the subject you are talking or writing about and talk or write about something different for a while.

example.ex: I've digressed a little to explain the situation so far, so let me now recap...
example.tran: 刚才我稍稍离题说明了迄今的情况，现在让我来概述一下。

example.ex: She digressed from her prepared speech to pay tribute to the President.
example.tran: 她脱离了发言稿的主题，对总统给予了高度赞扬。

means.word_mean: 1. lose clarity or turn aside especially from the main subject of attention or course of argument in writing, thinking, or speaking;

sentences.sentence: "She always digresses when telling a story"
"Don't digress when you give a lecture"

means.word_mean: 2. wander from a direct or straight course

auth_sentence.content: You could digress, in the way a novel does.
auth_sentence.res_content: You could digress, in the way a novel does.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You could digress, in the way a novel does.

auth_sentence.content: But I digress into matters which no longer concern me.
auth_sentence.res_content: But I digress into matters which no longer concern me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But I digress into matters which no longer concern me.

auth_sentence.content: Redirect people back to the agenda when they ramble or digress.
auth_sentence.res_content: Redirect people back to the agenda when they ramble or digress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Redirect people back to the agenda when they ramble or digress.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =two, double 表示"两个,双"; 2. 表示"使…变成,分开,离开"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有两个头的, 双头的
stems_affixes.word_buile: di两个,双+cephal头+ous……的→双头的
di两个,双+chrom颜色+atic表形容词→两色的
di两个,双+gam婚姻+ist人→二婚者
di两个,双+lemma论点,争论→二种争论→进退两难
di两个,双+oxide氧化物→二氧化物
di使…变成,分开,离开+lapid石头+ate表动词→[造房子的]石头分开→倒塌
di使…变成,分开,离开+gest带→分开带,只带营养→消化→经过消化后的精华→文摘
dicho=di两个,双+tom切割+ize表动词→切成二分
di两个,双+verge=vers转→两个转弯的地方→分岔;分歧
di使…变成,分开,离开+gress走→走开→离题
di使…变成,分开,离开+lapid石头+ate表动词→[造房子的]石头分开→倒塌
di使…变成,分开,离开+late放→分开放→扩大
di使…变成,分开,离开+lut冲洗+e→冲洗开→冲淡
di使…变成,分开,离开+mini小+ish表动词→变小,减少
di使…变成,分开,离开+vid分开+e→分开
di使…变成,分开,离开+vorce=vert转→从[丈夫身边]转开→离婚;参考:divert转开

stems_affixes.value_cn: 侵略的,好斗的,有进取心的,敢作敢为的
stems_affixes.word_buile: aggress[v.侵略,进攻]+ive……的→adj.侵略的,好斗的,有进取心的,敢作敢为的
progress[n.进步]+ive……的→adj.进步的,先进的;前进的
ag再+gress走+ion表名词→一再往前走→进攻

stems_affixes.value_cn: [代表]大会;[美国等国的]国会,议会
stems_affixes.word_buile: con一起+gress行走,步→走到一起→代表大会
de分开+gree=gress行走,步→分开走→级别→程度,度数

stems_affixes.value_cn: 离题, 脱轨, 扯到枝节上
stems_affixes.word_buile: digress[v.离题]+ion表名词→n.离题, 脱轨, 扯到枝节上
e出+gress行走,步→走出→出口
in进+gress行走,步→走进
pro向前+gress走→向前走

stems_affixes.value_cn: 违反, 犯罪, [地]海侵, 海进
stems_affixes.word_buile: transgress[v.冒犯;违背]+ion表名词→n.违反, 犯罪, [地]海侵, 海进
ag再+gress走→一再往前走→进攻
di离开,偏离+gress走→走开→离题
retro向后+gress走→向后走
trans横+gress走→横着走→冒犯
